name: NeoCrotalic Art NFT 1 of 1 Original Painting

metadata.name: “BIG BANG” 2020
metadata.description:
Arte Mexicano NeoCrotálico / NeoCrotalic Mexican Art
Artist/Artista: Javier López Pastrana 
Original Artwork: 
Año/Year: 2020
Técnica/Composition: Mixta/Óleo/Tela/Resina   Mixed / Oil / Canvas / Resin
Medidas/Size: 140x230cm/ 55x90in
https://www.neocrotalic.com/bigbang

Art current founded by the Mexican plastic artist Javier Lopez Pastrana (1956) Mexico City, this is part of his proposal to reincorporate pre-Hispanic Mesoamerican roots into modern art and inspire other Mexican artists.

Lopez Pastrana works across a variety of topics, including social, scientific, esoteric, technologic, abstract, and geometric abstraction, seeking to impact on Modern art across the American continents.

Original artwork and NFT video: https://youtu.be/DMCFrBxXk1M

https://linktr.ee/neocrotalic

One of the attractions of this collection is that the NFT is paired with the original physical work. 

In other words, once you acquire the NFT, you are welcome to get the original artwork as well.
